Claims.Text: the importance of social skills should not be neglected as those skills can help one to perform their job effectiveness and efficiency by facilitating interaction and communication with others

the importance of social skills have been recognized by increasing number of employers

Premises.Text: It is of importance that workers should be well educated and trained to perform duties of their job
people who work in professional fields such as medicals are required to have a university degree and years of experience
Social skills seem to be less important as they cannot contribute to the success of a surgery
organization have been transformed to customers oriented
Excellent social skills can help employees maintain strong relationship with their clients which thus lead to a better customer satisfaction

Better social skills allow them to resolve disagreements in a much more harmony way
